Trade/Device Name(s): Wondfo One Step Fecal Occult Blood Test
Specimen Container(s): Collection tube with 1.5 mL extraction buffer solution
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Wondfo One Step Fecal Occult Blood Test for qualitative detection of human occult blood in feces using immunoassay technology
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid test for qualitative detection of human occult blood in feces as an aid in the diagnosis of gastrointestinal bleeding, for laboratory, physician's office, and over-the-counter use
